# 配置 

按照 <https://bookdown.org/wangminjie/R4DS/bayesian-intro-stan.html> 配置Stan



## 测试 

```{r message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(rstan)
rstan_options(auto_write = TRUE)
options(mc.cores = parallel::detectCores())
```


这是一份肯塔基州赛马的数据集。

```{r message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
derby <- read_csv("./demo_data/derbyplus.csv") %>% 
  mutate(yearnew = year - 1896)
derby 
```



获胜速度是否有线性趋势？

```{r, fig.asp=0.618, fig.width= 6}
derby %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = speed)) +
  geom_point() 
```







```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
stan_program <- "
data {
  int<lower=0> N;
  vector[N] y;
  vector[N] x;
}
parameters {
  real alpha;
  real beta;
  real<lower=0> sigma;
}
model {
  y ~ normal(alpha + beta * x, sigma);
  
  alpha  ~ normal(0, 10);
  beta   ~ normal(0, 10);
  sigma  ~ exponential(1);
}

"

stan_data <- list(
   N = nrow(derby),
   y = derby$speed, 
   x = derby$yearnew
  )

fit <- stan(model_code = stan_program, data = stan_data)
```




```{r, fig.asp=0.618, fig.width= 6}
fit %>%
  tidybayes::spread_draws(alpha, beta, sigma) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = beta)) +
  tidybayes::stat_halfeye(
    fill = "skyblue",
    .width = c(0.66, 0.95),
    interval_colour = "red",
    point_colour = "red",
  ) +
  theme_bw()
```
